page.title: 14CRANHAM SCHOOL
page.content: The school in Cranham is again quite small with only 35 pupils, 21 juniors and 14 infants. There are 2 full time teachers and two part time but with help available from several parents who give of their time voluntarily to help with activities such as swimming, games and art activities. The school joins with several other small schools in the area for sports activities a music festival once a year and also with Birdlip, Coberley and N.Cerney schools for other curricular activities where children form all schools work together for one afternoon a week.The school has a good reputation for the children's successes in swimming and in chess when in this year 2 children have represented Gloucestershire in National finals.
